name: rabbitmq-node-amqp
description: A POC using RabbitMQ as a message broker with AMQP (Advanced Message Queuing Protocol) and Node.js as a client

scripts.build-docker-sender: cd bundles/sender && sudo docker build -t gigouni/node-amqp-sender
scripts.build-docker-receiver-mail: cd bundles/receiver_mail && sudo docker build -t gigouni/node-amqp-receiver-mail
scripts.build-docker-receiver-sms: cd bundles/receiver_sms && sudo docker build -t gigouni/node-amqp-receiver-sms

author: Nicolas GIGOU
